notFound.msg: Ooops... Sorry, we didn't find what you were looking for...

mainWelcomeDonate.welcomeText: Simply paste the url of your github * deposit into the form, click 'ANALYZE!' and wait for the scan result to see if your code has any errors and/or security holes.
mainWelcomeDonate.welcomeAsterisk: *Only available for public repositories hosted on github and coded in PHP ^5.4.

welcomeForm.labelUrl: Enter the URL of your project

welcomeModale.successMsg: We will sent your result by email
welcomeModale.errorMsg: GitHub API call limit exceeded, please try again in an hour. Check out the GitHub API documentation for more details

mainWelcomeDonate.donateText: SWAPP is an open source project and always will be that automates the detection of security vulnerabilities and/or code bugs. You have the possibility to support the project by making a donation to help us guarantee this service.
mainWelcomeDonate.donateAction: Take part in the maintenance of this project: make a donation!

signInOn.title: Log in or Create your account to benefit from all the features of the SWAPP application.
signInOn.whyTitle: Why should you create an account?
signInOn.whyText: The basic functions of the application are available free of charge without registration. However, connected users benefit from additional features: report by e-mail, possibility of help on php version upgrade, history of reports.

register.title: Register to benefit from all the features of the SWAPP application
register.termsText: Licenses: The content of the app is under MIT License. The application engine is powered by Laravel and the site's theme is a creation of: Les Casseurs Codeurs. Computing and Freedom: In accordance with the provisions of the Data Protection Act of January 6, 1978 as amended by the Law of August 6, 2004, all computer data concerning you is treated in a strictly confidential manner. You have the right to access, rectify and oppose your data. To do this, all you have to do is send us a request by e-mail, indicating your name, first name, address.Editor: Les Casseurs Codeurs. Use the contact form to contact them. Director of publication: Mohamed Zoghlami. Host: erre-tec

snackBar.success: Congratulations! Your account have been successfully created!
snackBar.error: Ooops! Error, can not register at the moment. If the problem persists, please contact an administrator.

snackBar.success: An email has been sent with a link to reset your password
snackBar.error: This email doesn't exist, please retry.

loginForm.title: Please enter your username and password to log in.

forgotPwd.title: Forgot password:
forgotPwd.subtitle: Please enter your account email address

title.action: What would you like to do today?

stats.text: SWAPP application allows you to detect bugs and/or security vulnerabilities in your code! Go to your dashboard to view your history
stats.migrationAssistance: repositories, and facilitated the migration of old versions of php5 upto php7 for more than

snackBar.success: Congratulations! Your profile has been successfully updated!
snackBar.error: Ooops! Error, can not edit your profile at the moment. If the problem persists, please contact an administrator.

card.numberOfScans: Number of scans for this project

cookies.text: We use cookies to store and/or access non-sensitive personal information stored on your device (unique identifiers, session, etc.), which we process in order to carry out site usage statistics, personalize the content and measure the results. performance, produce audience data, develop and improve the application.Click the 'Agree' button to consent to these uses on this site.
